Cmp3\Graphics

Class ColorModel_rgb

All Implemented Interfaces:

ColorModel_Interface
public class ColorModel_rgb
implements ColorModel_Interface

color model defines RGB colors
Based on code of the pear package Image_Color2.
author andrew morton <drewish@katherinehouse.com> license http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html LGPL License 2.1 The code is heavily changed and there's not very much left except the comments which are used when helpful.
